desc: Beautiful and scenic lavender farm in Creemore, Ontario. Open for visits during the summer months to relax in the lavender fields or book a photography session. Online store features all-natural, lavender-infused products for the home and body.

layout.text: Our collection of handmade, lavender-infused products for the bath, body, and home is thoughtfully curated to bring a relaxing aroma and naturally sourced ingredients into your everyday life.
